---
title: "Proposal"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
dir_path <- here("data")
subject <- dir_path %>% dir() %>% str_sub(2, 4) 
file_paths <- map(dir(here("data")), function(file_name) c(here("data", file_name)))

df <- map(file_paths, read.csv) %>% set_names(subject) %>%
    bind_rows(.id = "ID")
df$ID <- as.integer(df$ID)
df_nest <- df %>% group_by(ID) %>% nest()
```
